info.author: Faical Yannick Palingwende Congo
info.description: PyRepro is a command line and web tool to automatically reproducible records for executing processes. Typically the user can register a process that will be tracked by the rpr wrap and sync. PyRepro is enable for The collaborative cloud records platform DDSM (Data Driven Simulation Management cloud service).
info.keywords: reproducible, record, container, process, execution, environment, computational
info.name: PyRepro
